cgp_lib.cgp_config module¶

class cgp_lib.cgp_config.AlgorithmConfig(fitness_function, fitness_maximization: bool, target_fitness: float, population_size: int, generations: int, multiprocessing: bool = False, mode: str = 'default', np_dtype=<class 'numpy.int64'>, bitwise_paralllization=False)¶

Bases: object

valid_modes = {'cython', 'cython_binary', 'default', 'numpy'}¶
class cgp_lib.cgp_config.IndividualConfig(inputs: int, outputs: int, columns: int, rows: int, levels_back: int, node_functions, arity: int)¶

Bases: object

Configuration of parameters of CGP individuals.

Parameters:

  • inputs (int) – Number of inputs of the CGP individual.

  • outputs (int) – Number of outputs of the CGP individual.

  • columns (int) – Number of columns of the CGP individual.

  • rows (int) – Number of rows of the CGP individual.

  • levels_back (int) – Number of levels back the CGP individual can access.

  • node_functions (List[Callable]) – List of functions that can be used in CGP nodes.

  • arity (int) – Arity of the CGP nodes.
